page.title: 09SUPERNATURAL & TOURISM
page.content:
Across the road from the butcher's shop in{Kingsley}there is a house .In the house there lives a lady and when she goes down her back garden she can hear a{child screaming}who died in the house. There are some other{ghost stories ,but this is just one of them.
People come to visit this area mainly because of the{forest.} There they can go for a long walk and a short walk along the trails.There also is a very long walk which is called the{ Sandstone Trail,}it takes about one whole day to walk from one end to the other. Also quite a lot of people come to this area to{fish}in{Hatchmere {Lake.
